articles.description: Egyptian swimmer Omar Sayed Shaaban soared to success when he set a new record for the highest jump out of water while wearing a monofin.

articles.author: David Nield
articles.title: How to Tell Which Emails Quietly Track You - WIRED
articles.description: Your emails know more about you than you might think, like when you open them or when you forward them to others. But you can reclaim your privacy.
articles.content: Everyone sends emails now: political parties, your book club, freelance journalists, the social networks you're signed up to, your parents, that online store that you only bought one item from a deca… [+3446 chars]
